page.title: 05IMPROVING OUR AREA.
page.content: Our area could be improved by having more open spaces and more activity centres. There should also be a nursery and another park. The main shops should all be built into a big shopping centre. Why not have a place where old people can meet and have a drink as well. We could also have an activity centre for the people who like sports. There are a lot of busy roads. It would be a lot safer if there were more police patrolling around because of the fear of violence. They should especially patrol at night when hooligans are around. We have a small police station on our estate and this has helped to deter some hooligans.
